login.clickToContinue: Just click on the link to log in
login.loginBlurb: Click the link in your email to log in. It’s valid for 10 minutes to keep your account secure.

dashboard.get_started_blurb3: to seamlessly add Safiyo to your site or checkout flow.
dashboard.get_started_blurb5: Schedule time with a Safiyo representative, or reach out to our support team at {{support}} for personalized help.

survey.title: Survey Title
survey.chooseSurvey: Choose how you'd like to create your survey
survey.surveyBlurb: Build your survey exactly how you want, with full control over every question and setting.
survey.templateBlurb: Jumpstart your survey with ready-made templates designed for popular use cases.
survey.gatherInsights: Gathers insights on how customers discover your brand.
survey.selectAudiencePlaceholer: Select an audience for your survey
survey.checkoutSurveyBlurb: Embed the survey directly in the checkout experience to capture customer feedback at the point of purchase
survey.topUpSurveyBlurb: Display the survey as a non-intrusive pop-up on your website to engage visitors and gather insights.
survey.smsSurveyBlurb: Send the survey directly to your audience via SMS, allowing them to respond on their mobile device.
survey.integrateSurveyBlurb: Copy the publishable API key below to integrate your survey into your e-commerce checkout flow.
survey.note: NOTE: Add the API key to your checkout settings or use it with our SDK to embed the survey
survey.surveyCheckout: Your survey is now integrated into your checkout flow and ready to collect responses!
